relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, mid abdominal tenderness with focal peritonitis
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial abdominal exam showed mid abdominal tenderness with focal peritonitis; later exam reported abdomen as soft and nontender with wounds healing well.
